# Your zero-fee cash wedding registry

Save for your dreams faster with a zero-fee cash fund registry.

[Get Started](https://withjoy.com/createwedding?scenario=registry)

## Cash Registry

## Cash gifting is easier than ever.

Integrations with your favorite cash sharing services allow your loved ones to skip the credit card fees and easily contribute to your cash fund via Venmo, PayPal, and CashApp with zero fees. 

[Get Started](https://withjoy.com/createwedding?scenario=registry)

## Your Universal Registry

## Ask for everything you want, in one place.

Add cash and honeymoon funds, experiences, physical gifts, gift cards, and more to your All-in-One Registry, giving your wedding guests one convenient place to shop.

## Frequently   
Asked   
Questions

Is it ok to register for cash as a wedding gift?

In many parts of the world, itâs common (and sometimes expected) to give money in lieu of items. In recent years, cash gifting has become more and more popular in the US, as a way of elevating experiences instead of accumulating things.

What is Joyâs cash fee?

Joy has zero fees on cash gifts. We donât take a dime â its that simple.

How does Joys zero-fee cash gifting work ?

Weâve integrated with your favorite cash-sharing services such as Venmo, PayPal, and Cash App, so that guests can easily and conveniently send funds to couples from a credit card or bank account without being charged a transaction fee or any other fee.

How can I explain to my guests that we are using a cash registry?

For your family and friends who are more used to gift registries, itâs helpful to include a note explaining what their cash gift will go towards and expressing your gratitude for any amount they are able to give.

Can we add gifts from other stores?

Absolutely! You can add items from multiple retailers, or from anywhere online, to your Joy registry with Joyâs universal registry button.

What if Iâve already created my registry?

Not to worry! You can link any registry youâve already created to your Joy registry page.

Can we create a honeymoon registry with Joy?

Yes! Joyâs registry platform allows you to set up a cash fund specifically for your honeymoon...

How many types of wedding registries should I have?

Itâs always good to give your loved ones plenty of gift ideas. Some wedding guests may be uncomfortable with the idea of giving money, so itâs best to include other registry options such as a gift registry as well.

What other wedding planning features does Joy provide?

Joy is the smarter way to plan your big day. We provide everything from wedding invitations, and online RSVP, to guest list tools and planning guides with everything you need to know from your engagement to your wedding day and beyond.

What does Joy cost?

Joy wedding websites, planning tools, and registry are free. Online Save the Dates and invitations have hundreds of free designs, as well as premium paid designs.

Do you have a support team we can reach out to if we have questions?

Absolutely! Our amazing support team works hard around the clock, every day of the week, including weekends, to make sure that your questions are answered. You can send us an email at [support@withjoy.com](mailto:support@withjoy.com).
